name: EXPO game art year 1 HKU
description:
This past year I have made a lot of progress and all types of art. In this museum I show off the highlights. This was made as an excercise and reflection for myself but also for students and friends who want to see what I have been up to.

I've had a lot of fun making this project and even learned some new things with unity. I hope you enjoy the expo!

All assets, textures and animations are made by me, with an exception of the grass model & texture supplied by a fellow student to display the movement shader.

The background music was found for free online:
ES_ambience by Megan Wofford
